utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And here's little Ben nodding off...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Awww, look at Aunt Monica's little boy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look, he's got Ross's haircut!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, let me see! Oh, God, is he just the sweetest thing? You must just want to kiss him all over!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That would be nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pardon?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing, just a little extra air in my mouth. Pffft. Pffffffft.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Chan, can you help me out here? I promise I'll pay you back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, right, OK... inlcuding the waffles last week, you now owe me... 17 jillion dollars.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I will, really. I'll pay you back this time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ... And where's this money coming from?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well... I'm helping out down at the N.Y.U. Med School with some... research.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What kind of research?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, just, y'know.... science.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Science. Yeah, I think I've heard of that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ... It's a fertility study.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Joey, please tell me you're only donating your time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, come on you guys, it's not that big a deal. Really... I mean, I just go down there every other day and... make my contribution to the project. Hey, hey, but at the end of two weeks, I get seven hundred dollars.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, ooh, you're gonna be making money hand over fist!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK, we got the cole slaw, we got the buns...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We've got the ground-up flesh of formerly cute cows and turkeys, ew...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Men are here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We make fire. Cook meat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then put out fire by peeing, no get invited back.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Ewww!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh Joey, Melanie called, said she's gonna be late.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, OK.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how are things going with you two? Is she becoming your special someone?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know, she's, uh.... she's pretty great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah? What does she think of your little science project?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What, you think I'm gonna tell a girl I like that I'm also seeing a cup?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Man's got a point.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, the tough thing is, she really wants to have sex with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Crazy bitch.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I still got a week left to go in the program, and according to the rules, if I want to get the money I'm not allowed to conduct any... ersonal experiments, if you know what I mean.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey... we always know what you mean.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How long did you think this barbecue was gonna last?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm going to China.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Jeez, you say one thing, and...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're going to China?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, i-it's for the museum. Someone found a bone, we want the bone, but they don't want us to have the bone, so I'm going over there to try to persuade them to give us the bo—it's—it's a whole big bone thing. Anyway, I'm gonna be gone for like, uh... like a week, so, uh, if you wanna reach me, y-you can't. So here's my itinerary . Um... here's a picture of me...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, let me see!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: : Could you take it to Carol's every now and then, and show it to Ben, just so he doesn't forget me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, Ben. I'm your father. I am... the head. Aaaaaahhhh.... Alright, this barbecue is gonna be very fun.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, is Rachel here? Um, I wanted to wish her a happy birthday before I left.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, she's out having drinks with Carl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Hey, who's Carl?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, that guy she met at the coffeehouse.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well, see, there's this guy she met at the...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: At the coffeehouse, right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you do know who he is! Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, I'm gonna go say goodbye to the guys.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hey, y'know what? Tell them that bone story.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ....I have to go to China.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The country?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No no, this big pile of dishes in my mom's breakfront. Do you guys know who Carl is?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, let's see... Alvin... Simon... Theodore.... no.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, Rachel's having drinks with him tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no! How can she do that when she's never shown any interest in you?!?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Forget about her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's right, man. Please. Move on. Go to China. Eat Chinese food.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Course there, they just call it food.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah... I guess. I don't—I don't know. Alright, just... just give her this for me, OK?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, buddy, we're just looking out for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We want you to be happy. And I may only have a couple beers in me, but... I love you, man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm still on my first. I just think you're nice.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: Anyway, that's when me and my friends started this whole fruit basket business. We call ourselves 'The Three Basketeers.'

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Like the three musketeers, only with fruit.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooooh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK, how does everybody like their burgers?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, no. Presents first. Food later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, hold on there, tiger. How's it going? How you holding up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, not so good. She definitely thinks tonight is the night we're gonna... complete the transaction, if you know what I...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Then you do. Heh, heh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, uh, have you ever thought about being there for her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know, just be there for her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not following you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Think about it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK, I'm guessing this is from...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, thank you, Melanie.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK, this one right here is from me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK... ah, it's light... ...it rattles... it's... Travel Scrabble! Oooohhh, thank you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This one's from Joey... feels like a book. Thinks it's a book... feels like a book. And......it's a book!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's Dr. Seuss!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: : That book got me through some tough times.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: There is a little child inside this man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, the doctors say if they remove it, he'll die.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who's this from?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's Ross's.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... ... Oh my God. He remembered.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Remembered what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It was like months ago. We were walking by this antique store, and I saw this pin in the window, and I told him it was just like one my grandmother had when I was a little girl. Oh! I can't believe he remembered!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, sure, but can you play it on a plane?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's so pretty. This must have cost him a fortune.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe he did this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, Ross? Remember back in college, when he fell in love with Carol and bought her that ridiculously expensive crystal duck?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What did you just say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ahem... um... Crystal duck.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, no.... the, um, the... 'love' part?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: F-hah.... flennin....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.... my God.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, no-no-no-no-no....

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's good, just keep rubbing your head. That'll turn back time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean, this is unbelievable.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. This is really, really huge.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No it's not. It's small. It's tiny. It's petite. It's wee.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nuh-uh. I don't think any of our lives are ever gonna be the same ever again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK, is there a mute button on this woman?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think this is so great! I mean, you and Ross! D-did you have any idea?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! None! I mean, my first night in the city, he mentioned something about asking me out, but nothing ever happened, so I just... : W-well, what else did he say? I mean, does he, like, want to go out with me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, given that he's desperately in love with you, he probably wouldn't mind getting a cup of coffee or something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross? All this time? Well, I've got to talk to him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: H-He's in China!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The country.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, wait. His flight doesn't leave for another forty-five more minutes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What about the time difference?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: From here to the airport?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! You're never gonna make it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, what're you gonna say to him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I-I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well then maybe you shouldn't go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's right, cause if you're just gonna, like, break his heart, that's the kind of thing that can wait.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but if it's good news, you should tell him now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know. Maybe I'll know when I see him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here, look, alright, does this help?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noooo... look, all I know is that I cannot wait a week until I see him. I mean, this is just too big. Y'know, I just, I've just gotta talk to him. I... I gotta... OK, I'll see you later.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Rachel, I love you! Deal with me first!

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Alright!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ni-chou chi-ma!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me....

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: May I see your boarding pass?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, I don't have one. I just need to talk to my friend.

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Oh, oooh. I'm sorry. You are not allowed on the jetway unless you have a boarding pass.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I know, but I—he just went on. He's right there, he's got the blue jacket on, I... can I j-just...

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: No no no! Federal regulations!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK, alright, OK, um... then could you please, uh... just give him a message for me? Please? This is very important.

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Alright. What's the message?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh... I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Sir? Sir? Excuse me, sir? Uh... I have a message for you.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Flight Attendant
utterance.content: It's from Rachel. She said that she loved the present, and she will see you when you get back.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: : Toby... Oh, for God's sake, I don't know what she's talking about! There's no Rachel! Don't give me that deep freeze.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: Mmmmmm... Oh, Joey, Joey, Joey... I think I blacked out there for a minute!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Heh, heh. It was nothin'.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: Well, now we've gotta find something fun for you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhh.. y'know what? Forget about me. Let's, uh... let's give you another turn.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: M-Me again?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure! Why not?

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: Boy, somebody's gonna get a big fruit basket tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: Oooh, I gotta tell you... you are nothing like I thought you would be.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Melanie
utterance.content: I don't know, I-I guess I just had you pegged as one of those guys who're always 'me, me, me.' But you... you're a giver. You're like the most generous man I ever met. I mean... you're practically a woman.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, so, uh, Rach, uh... do you wanna save this wrapping paper, I mean, it's only a little bit torn... so are you gonna go for it with Ross or should I just throw it out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know. I don't know... I thought about it all the way there, and I thought about it all the way back... and, uh, oh, you guys, y'know, it's Ross. Y'know what I mean? I mean, it's Ross.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know, I mean, this is just my initial gut feeling... but I'm thinking... oh, I'm thinking it'd be really great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, me too! Oh! Oh, we'd be like friends-in-law! Y'know what the best part is? The best part is that you already know everything about him! I mean, it's like starting on the fifteenth date!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but, y'know, it's... it would be like starting on the fifteenth date.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Another good point.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I mean, I mean, when you're at the fifteenth date, y'know, you're already in a very relationshippy place. Y'know, it's... you're committed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I mean, then what happens if it doesn't work out?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why isn't it working out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know... sometimes it doesn't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is he not cute enough for you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Does he not make enough money?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I'm just....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe there's someone else.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wha...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is there? Is there someone else?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! There is.. there is noone else!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then why the hell are you dumping my brother?!?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, big...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Shhhh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...spender.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She's still asleep.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So how'd it go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it was amazing. You know how you always think you're great in bed?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The fact that you'd even ask that question shows how little you know me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, it's like, last night, I couldn't do the thing that usually makes me great. So I had to do all this other stuff. And the response I got... man, oh man, it was like a ticker tape parade!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, I know, as it happens my room is very very close to the parade route.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It was amazing! And not just for her... uh-uh. For me, too. It's like, all of a sudden, I'm blind. But all my other senses are heightened, y'know? It's like... I was able to appreciate it on another level.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn't know you had another level.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! Neither did I!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, great skirt! Birthday present?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, from who?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: From you. I exchanged the blouse you got me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, it's the thought. Hey, doesn't Ross's flight get in in a couple hours? At gate 27-B?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, yeah. Uh, Monica, y'know, honey, I've been thinking about it and I've decided this—this whole Ross thing, it's just not a good idea.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because, I feel like I wouldn't just be going out with him. I would be going out with all of you. Oh, and there would just be all this pressure, and I don't wanna...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, no, no, no, no pressure, no pressure!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, nothing has even happened yet, and you're already so...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I am not 'so'! OK, I was a teensy bit weird at first, but... I'll be good. I promise.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Intercom
utterance.content: It's me, Carl.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: C'mon up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Behind my brother's back? ... is exactly the kind of crazy thing you won't be hearing from me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seven hundred bucks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright, you did it! Do we have any fruit?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, hell of a two weeks, huh? Y'know what, though? I really feel like I learned something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? So, you're gonna stick with this 'it's all for her' thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What, are you crazy? When a blind man gets his sight back, does he walk around like this?

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: I'm just sayin', if I see one more picture of Ed Begley, Jr. in that stupid electric car, I'm gonna shoot myself! I mean, don't get me wrong... I'm not against environmental issues per se.... it's just that guy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe you'd rather go out with him than me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Would you excuse me, please? I'm trying to have a date here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, just stop thinking about me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can't do it, can you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So I'm thinking about you. So what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't get it. What do you see in this guy, anyway?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well... he happens to be a very nice... guy....

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: I mean, come on, buddy, get a real car!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel, come on. Give us a chance.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, it's too hard.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no... why, because it might get weird for everyone else? Who cares about them. This is about us. Look, I-I've been in love with you since, like, the ninth grade.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, you're like my best friend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: If we broke up, and I lost you...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa. What makes you think we're gonna break up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, have you been involved with someone where you haven't broken up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. But... it only has to happen once. Look, you and I both know we are perfect for each other, right? I mean... so, the only question is... are you attracted to me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know... I mean, I've never looked at you that way before.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, start looking.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: Exactly! And you just know I'm gonna be the guy caught behind this hammerhead in traffic!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right! You're right!

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: Heh... y'know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what?

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I forgot... I am supposed to pick up a friend at the airport. I am so sorry! I'm so... if you want to stay, and finish your drinks, please do.... I mean—I'm sorry. I-I-I gotta go. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: But...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Hi.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: For God's sake, will you let it go? There's no Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hey, hey, I got that.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: Oh, thanks, sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No problem. I cannot wait for you to meet my friends.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: You don't think they'll judge and ridicule me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, they will. I just... uh...

utterance.speaker: Ross and Julie
utterance.content: Can't wait.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, they're gonna love you.
